documents.document: @Dianna_chs don't move! I know it's hard and exercise can often lessen symptoms but it makes it worse overall. Rest up and feel better!
@DOUBLEJGLOBALBC Not suggesting translink can't do better but they are not alone.
@DOUBLEJGLOBALBC they don't. Search any city, snow, transit delays and you will get lots of results.
@JesseLehrich Let's make sure kids never learn enough to over throw us.
@fabulavancouver do these people think Toronto magically clears all their snow immediately??
@ddale8 he's deflecting a lot.
@maggieru there may be times not to buy now is not one of those times.
@sarahkel00 @bruce_arthur I have seen a number of places that say no.
@bruce_arthur it's not just refugees! Applies to dual citizens as well. Insanity.
@Dianna_chs so I've heard but I've never watched it!
@Dianna_chs it's the best show to watch while I ride my bike on the trainer.
@Dianna_chs full on guilty pleasure!
@Dianna_chs so glad it's back!
@dandrezner apologies are so far from being necessary.
@VancouverSun that's how I arrived in this country as a child over 30 years ago. And knew many families in the same situation then.
@ddale8 they don't need to be fed or have medical care of course.
@Green_Footballs don't forget the Border Patrol Chief is gone too.
@theJagmeetSingh two psychiatrist parents for me and I wholeheartedly agree.
@ekoreen Thank you for talking about this. I am sorry you are struggling and hope the struggle lessens.
First time @Google search results have made me so upset. Highlighting fake news stories as some of the top results on @lsarsour.
@ShaunKing @realDonaldTrump who did he borrow the settlement money from?
@7im is it city responsibility to clear sidewalks? It's not here (Vancouver, BC) and there was an uproar over that here the last few weeks.
@ClaraJeffery Unfortunately no fix for narcissism.
@Chris_arnade same as buying a 2 pack of TP. The bulk which is overall much cheaper is too much of an outlay all at once.
@CityofVancouver backed all the way up Taylor Way by 8:30. The North Shore will be a mess for 2 weeks.
.@CityofVancouver Georgia backed up onto Lions Gate due to closure at VAG. Opening Robson for the duration of construction would make sense.
But he was down??
@CUrquhartGlobal @ParkBoard @GlobalBC @BC1 controversial to a small fee. Seems most people are supportive.
@fabulavancouver yes, heard that this am. Happy it seems more outrage over closing them (from what I've read).
@fabulavancouver any #s of those who wanted them closed?
@ChrisWarcraft It made me not want to watch football ever again (yet I will).
@minakimes great piece. It verbalizes how I feel about a lot of situations associated with the NFL yet I continue to watch and love it.
@bruce_arthur Howie Mandel's is also really good.
@CityofVancouver @runnerphysio @Smithrite I would think the city should contact smithrite? It's your contract and the people's taxes.
@DOUBLEJGLOBALBC sidewalk likely not city's responsibility. Owner of the property should be fined.
@AM730Traffic all lanes now closed at the Lions Gate.
@DOUBLEJGLOBALBC that's the last thing the rescuers want and have said as much many times.
@MollyRitt that you'll pay him how Trump pays the people he employs (by not paying them/him).
@bruce_arthur this is not at all funny but i just want to laugh and laugh.
@GlobalBC I stay in the car with my dog and that's not going to change. Plus the a/c is always freezing!
@JWGOP I think it's a worldwide problem.
@muppetdogs my mom didn't change hers. Nor did I.It was never a possibility that I would and my husband would have thought it weird if I did
@muppetdogs @ShaunKing 's feed is terrifying.
.@ShaunKing 's feed is absolutely terrifying right now.
@sproudfoot @MissHeatherF great read and really terrifying.
@sproudfoot this is what I keep saying. I cannot rationalize it in any way.
Thank you Stan Van Gundy and Steve Kerr. Happy to watch basketball today.
@sproudfoot Naomi's Road and Naomi's Tree
@Dave_Eby technically not exempt? People just assuming/hoping they will be permanent residents in time to not have to pay..
@TPCarney many issues but sexism definitely one.
@Cabbie @jeremyhopwood @JustinTrudeau maybe we should be
Is this the worst day ever? I hope I look back at this and am wrong.
@bruce_arthur I wish I had that much hope left.
@rodmickleburgh @BarackObama he's got 2 mos to figure out something.
@ekoreen whatever it takes. And it's going to take a lot.
I wish I was being facetious saying I think it's the end of the world as we know it.
@lizardcullen was just saying the same thing. Even the people I follow on Twitter.
@jodikantor @kelljokrause like its the end of the world as we know it and I'm not being facetious.
@laurenfleshman unfortunately not so invisible
Serious anxiety. America, what are you doing?
@attnkatdaley Have both @nytimes and @latimes open so I can see specific states and overall.
@AoDespair @fakedansavage @JeffreyGuterman @HuffPostPol so glad to be Canadian. It's not perfect but I could not imagine that happening here
Oh great, more bad football. #SEAvsAZ
ALL THE HOUSES.
@oiselle when it's just rain sure, but with this wind, it's safer to stay inside!
@fakedansavage or a woman.

. @WhitecapsFC more security needed! Standing in the rain that long is not a pleasant start to the game.

@VancouverSun The boohoo my house is worth millions is as bad as the NIMBYism.
Finding the un-ordered @instagram timeline as bad as @facebook. I barely use FB now, guessing this won't make me want to use IG either.
@Lana or the Queen being called 'the birthday girl'.
@andreareimer true, and even w/o the street closed people still enjoy it 'just' to walk. Bu there are very few E/W driving corridors in DT.
@andreareimer yes, that walking as a means of transportation and a walk at lunch to get out of the office are very different.
@andreareimer not surprising on a nice day. and how many are office workers out for a walk and not actually going anywhere.
@sproudfoot i don't even think that most people who live here do Vancouver well. Never mind tourists doing it well!
@sproudfoot that plus good food/coffee/beer. Hard to beat. For me.
@sproudfoot so much depends on what you did and what you like to do. For me nothing beats riding in the mountains then being by/on ocean.
@Miss604 @HelloBC Just not right now because the tunnels are currently closed.
